amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Nuclear Waste Disposal by $150 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Nuclear Waste Disposal by $150 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A027) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Titus.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A027) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
